verblex: 1. To operate on a male or a female so as to make it impossible for him or her to produce or have babies. English = sterilise.
2. Of a woman, to have a tubal ligation. Idiomatic English = have one's tubes tied.
nomlex: 1. A medical operation that makes it impossible for a male or female to produce or have babies. English = sterilisation.
2. A surgical operation that makes it impossible for a female to have or produce babies, by cutting or tying the fallopian tubes. Formal English = tubal ligation.
3. A surgical operation that is done in order to sterilize a man, by cutting the tube that carries sperm to his penis.  English = vasectomy.
